comment.author: Anthony
comment.text: Its about time we pull a page out of the black lives matter book and start saying...No justice, no peace! We won't rest until Hillary is punished!!!!

replies.author: Mickayla
replies.text: She won't be unless Trump is elected.

replies.author: Caleigh
replies.text: Hitlary would probably slip radioactive isotopes into your fridge while you were outside protesting lol ... but protesting needs to be done, she has to answer for a long, long line of heinous things.
